Name: Pang and Bang
About the game: Pang and Bang is a tribute to the old 'pop the bubbles' games that you could find in the arcades, but with an erotic twist. Play as a grotesque monkey and pop as many bubbles as you can! Go back to the gallery to see all the beautiful ladies that you have unlocked! Z - Jump, X - Fire. As simple as that!
